    • Method Detail

      • generateSecureStorageLogbook

        public GUID generateSecureStorageLogbook()
                                  throws TraceabilityException,
                                         IOException,
                                         StorageLogException,
                                         LogbookClientBadRequestException,
                                         LogbookClientAlreadyExistsException,
                                         LogbookClientServerException
        secure the logbook operation since last securisation.
        Returns:
        the GUID of the operation
        Throws:
        TraceabilityException - if error on generating secure logbook
        IOException - if an IOException is thrown while generating the secure storage
        StorageLogException - if a LogZipFile cannot be generated
        LogbookClientBadRequestException - if a bad request is encountered
        LogbookClientAlreadyExistsException - if the logbook already exists
        LogbookClientServerException - if there's a problem connecting to the logbook functionnality
        LogbookNotFoundException - if not found on selecting logbook operation
        InvalidParseOperationException - if json data is not well-formed
        LogbookDatabaseException - if error on query logbook collection
        InvalidCreateOperationException - if error on creating query
